# largeSubtitle

**Instance Property**

String to be rendered below the large title.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var largeSubtitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When `nil`, the navigation bar will fall back to the `subtitle`.

## Configuring the subtitle

- **subtitle**: A string to display as the subtitle in the navigation bar.
- **attributedSubtitle**
- **largeAttributedSubtitle**
